```{r setup, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='hide', warning=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  fig.path = "knitr-figs-docx/",
  cache.path = "knitr-cache-docx/",
  fig.asp = 0.618,
  fig.width = 6.5,
  echo = FALSE,
  dev = "png",
  dpi = 180,
  ft.align = "left"
)
```

```{r load-libraries, cache=FALSE}
# add other packages here:
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(flextable) # recommended package for adding tables
```

```{r fig-settings, eval=FALSE}
# Optional: specify custom ggplot settings. If using, set eval to TRUE
theme_set(theme_bw())
theme_update(
  axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
  legend.text = element_text(size = 10),
  axis.title = element_text(size = 10),
  strip.text = element_text(size = 10),
  plot.margin = margin(t = 0.1, b = 0.1, l = 0.1, r = 0.1, "cm"),
  legend.position = c(1, 1),
  legend.justification = c(1, 1),
  legend.background = element_blank(),
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank()
)
```


```{r tab-settings}
# recommended table settings to match CSAS table style and accessibility standards
flextable::set_flextable_defaults(
  font.size = 10,
  padding.left = 3,
  padding.right = 3,
  padding.top = 1,
  padding.bottom = 1,
  na_str = "-",
  theme_fun = "theme_booktabs"
)
```
